summation_rule: Income categories typically have credit balances (negative). Convert these to positive for display. For 'Foreign exchange income', sum algebraically and present the net result.
additional_instructions: Interest from bank includes both UOB (GL 7000/00001) and MBB (GL 7000/00002) interest income. Foreign exchange income (GL 7100/00000) should be presented as 'Gain on foreign exchange fluctuations (net)' if the result is positive (net gain). Miscellaneous income includes GL 7000/00000.
